preqs: ECE2071 or TRC2400 or (MEC2407 and MEC3458)

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2071, TRC2400} OR  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MEC2407, MEC3458})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-ELEC, MAEELEC01} Otherwise true

description: This unit will introduce students to modern instrumentation, measurement theory, control and systems testing. The unit will introduce virtual and modular software and hardware tools and data bus architectures. A brief overview of the relevant industrial standards and protocols as well as expected future development will be included, along with the issues of measurement uncertainties, calibration and statistical analysis of results. There will be an additional section within the unit that will equip students with basic knowledge of occupational health and safety issues related to instrumentation.
